featured.text: The organic food products are made of natural ingredients, with no ______ flavors added.
Pets are wonderful, B.…with the freshest ingredients.
The candy can no longer be sold because it was found to contain artificial ingredients far beyond the _____ level.

definition.zh_def: 成分，指用於製作食物或其他產品的物質。
definition.en_def: A substance that is part of a mixture or compound, especially in cooking.
definition.example: Flour is a key ingredient in making bread.
